title: Paul Mooney, Shaq and Sir Charles, Sheryl Underwood, Carla's Reality Update and more.
itunes:title: Paul Mooney, Shaq and Sir Charles, Sheryl Underwood, Carla's Reality Update and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! This is The Baddest Radio Show in the Land, bar none, cash money on it. Who you thought it was? It's Thursday up in this piece. The Chief Love Officer has a lady writing in and the subject of "who the house goes to" gets brought up. The Godfather of Comedy passed away yesterday at his home in Oakland, CA from a heart attack. We get Shaq and Sir Charles talking and we found out something about mommas. Big Dog also has something to add! Our girl from The Talk reflects on her fondest memories of the late great Paul Mooney. "He was woke before woke was a thang." Carla starts out Reality Update with Ready to Love and Nephew is here to verify. 45 is in more trouble. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve reflects on the legend Paul Mooney and his contribution to comedy.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
